Edges-Arcane Archer -- Male Human Heroic Bard
Attributes (13 Points):
Agility: d8 Smarts: d8 Spirit: d10 Strength: d8 Vigor: d12
Attribute Notes:
Adaptability: +1 Attribute Points
Armor Interference: -4 Agility w/medium or heavy armor or shield
Skills (16 Points):
Athletics: (agi) d6 Language (Common): (sma) d8 Persuasion: (spi) d4-1
Common Knowledge: (sma) d8 Notice: (sma) d4 Shooting: (agi) d8
Gambling: (sma) d4 Occult: (sma) d6 Spellcasting: (sma) d4
Intimidation: (spi) d4 Performance: (spi) d10 Stealth: (agi) d4
Languages: Abyssal; Aklo; Aquan; Auran; Common
Skill Notes:
Mean: -1 Persuasion
Armor Interference: -4 Performance and Agility-based skills w/medium or heavy armor or shield
Danger Sense: +2 Notice (surprise)/Rolls Notice-2 in circumstances not normally subject to Notice
Hard Of Hearing: -4 Notice (hearing)
Sharp Tongued: May substitute Performance for Taunt
Size: 0 Alignment: Neutral Deity: Calistria (Neutral)
Advances: 12 Improvement Points: 28 Improvement Points Allocation: Attribute: 14; Edge: 10; Skill: 4
Features
Edges (7 points): Arcane Archer II: 1; Arcane Archer III: 1; Arcane Archer: 1; Bard: 1; Danger Sense: 1; New Powers: 2 Hindrances: Hard Of Hearing; Mean; Secret+ Human Features: Adaptability
Feature Notes:
Adaptability: +1 Edge Points
Arcane Archer II: May apply Phase Arrow and Hail Of Arrows features 1/encounter
Arcane Archer III: May apply Imbue Arrow feature 1/tn and Death Arrow feature 1/dy
Arcane Archer: May apply Enhance Arrow feature or Arrow Trapping feature to each shot
Bard: Has Arcane Background (Bard), Armor Interference, and Sharp Tongued features
Mean: Ill-tempered and disagreeable
Secret+: Hides knowledge to protect self or others from major trouble
Combat
Parry: 3 (1) Cover: 0 Toughness: 10 (2) Pace/Run: 6/+d6
Armor: Leather Jacket Shield: Light Shield Weapons: Lance (d8+d8); Short Bow (2d6 R12"); Spiked Chain (d8+d6 AP 1); Unarmed (d8+d0)
Combat Notes:
Vigor Toughness Modifier: +6
Arrow Trapping: Arrow has environmental trapping
Death Arrow: Successful arrow attack kills (Vigor neg)
Enhance Arrow: Arrow gains +1 attack and inflicts +1 damage
Hail Of Arrows: Arrow effects all in 3" radius
Phase Arrow: Arrow passes through obstacles
Arcana
Power Count: 7 Power Points: 10
Powers:
Blind: (2 PP Necr) R8" Target suffers -2 on vision tasks (Raise -4) (Vigor neg 2 points (Raise 4) each rd) (+2/+3 PP 2"/3" radius; +1 PP Vigor-2)
Bolt: (1 PP Evoc) R16" Inflicts 2d6 damage (Raise 3d6) (+2 PP Inflicts 3d6 damage (Raise 4d6); +2 PP Incapacitating damage disintegrates (Vigor neg); +4 PP Inflicts 4d6 damage (Raise 5d6) as heavy weapon; +2 PP ROF 2)
Curse: (5 PP Necr) RTouch Target suffers 1 level fatigue and additional level each sunset (Spirit neg) (+5 PP Inflicts fatigue each rd (Spirit neg); incapacity turns to stone)
Damage Field: (4 PP Abju) R8" Creatures adjacent to target suffer 2d4 damage for 5 rd (+2 PP 2" radius; +2 PP 2d6 damage; +4 PP Inflicts 3d6 damage as heavy weapon; +2 PP Moves effect 8"/rd)
Drain Power Points: (2 PP Necr) R8" Drains 1d6 Power Points (Cast suffers -2 if backgrounds differ; Raise adds drained Power Points to self; Spirit neg) (+2 PP Drains 2d6 Power Points)
Fear: (2 PP Necr) R8" Target Extra flees, Wild Card rolls on fear table (Spirit neg; Raise Spirit-2, fear table +2) (+2/+3 PP 2"/3" radius; +2 PP Inflicts Spirit-2 on Fear (Raise -4))
Mind Wipe: (3 PP Ench) R8" Target forgets up to 30 min (Raise several hour) event (Smarts neg) after 1 min activation (+1 PP Edits memory; +2 PP Activate power as an action; +2 PP Completely removes all memory of a person, place, or thing)
Planar Binding: (8 PP Conj) R8" Summons extraplanar creature to perform service (Spirit neg)
Protection: (2 PP Abju) R8" Target gains +2 Armor (Raise +2 Toughness) for 5 rd (+1 PP/additional target)
Zombie: (3+ PP Necr) R8" Animates and controls corpse for 1 hr or stores PP for permanent (+1 PP/additional target; +1 PP Target is armed; +1 PP Target has 2 Armor points; +1 PP Self can use target senses; +1 PP Corpse becomes animated skeleton)
Common Power Modifiers: +1 PP Adaptable Caster; +1/+2/+3 PP Armor Piercing; +2 PP Fatigue; +1 PP Glow/Shroud; +2 PP Heavy Weapon; +1 PP Hinder/Hurry; +2 PP Lingering Damage; +1/+2 PP Dbl/Tpl Range; +1 PP Selective
Arcana Notes:
Arcane Background (Bard): 3 Powers/10 Power Points
New Powers: +4 Power Count
Imbue Arrow: Centers area spell where arrow lands
